title: riot giving one tricks recognition
body: i just think that is would be nice if riot gave all the one tricks out there at have substantial amount of points on a champ something (1 million points or something). like just a small banner on the loading screen or a fancy boarder so you can show off to your team mates that you've committed a lot of time to that champ. just a thought

replies.body: I wish you could link multiple accounts so the numbers are cumulative, like my new account wont have all the points my banned account will have :/
maybe don't get yourself banned my friend
account bans and your time played on champs don't have any correlation and thus shouldn't be treated as such

wow, you played yourself with that comment. you do realize that if you only have 1 account, you dont need to make multiple accounts which makes you feel the need to link mastery scores. I still stand with my comment, don't get yourself banned and all your sh*t will be on a singular account.

Neither do skins and account bans. Or mastery points and account bans. Or rank and account bans. They have no correlation either. You've still spent time earning all that stuff regardless of wether your account gets banned.

So if you get banned, they should just transfer over all your stuff right? Seeming it has no correlation. 
If that the case... Soooooo whats the point in even banning an account?

The whole point of having your account banned, is that you have to start from scratch with EVERYTHING. Thats the incentive for not being toxic.

If you just got back all _(or even some)_ of the things you lost, how is it an incentive?

you know what you do keep though, your skill level at the game, and the ability to play certain champs, which as i said, has no correlation to a ban. Rank you can get back within a week of your 10 provisional games, providing your plat or under. What you cant get back is the time spent getting mastery points. So yes, you lose everything when you lose an account to teach you your lesson. However the player does not lose his skill, go on, hit me up with some other comment that is redundant.

> go on, hit me up with some other comment that is redundant.


Jet fuel cant melt steel beams.
The amount of up votes i hope you get essembie

No, the player doesn't lose his skill.
But thats not what they're trying to take away from you.

They are taking away the recognition you have of having that skill.
If you want to be known as being an X champ master again, you have to work for it all over again. THATS the point, no one wants that _(your doing a fine job of proving that point)_, and thats why the punishment works.

If they took away things you didn't care about, how is it a punishment?
if you were a master one trick, the people who play that champ arent just going to forget you because you got banned, they will wait for your new account. Once again, redundant comment

If thats truly the case and it doesn't make any difference, then why are you here complaining about it? If you're truly a good 1-trick, then it doesn't matter how many mastery points you have, people still know you right?


If having the mastery points does matter to you, then thats proof that taking them away was a good punishment.
If they don't matter  _(like you say)_ why are you here saying you want them?

If you want them, surely they must mean something to you. Hence making removing them a valid punishment.

Youre right, people should be rewarded for only playing 1/140th of the game! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

__________

Sarcasm aside though, I'm all for giving recognition, but one-tricking is not a healthy play style, _(both for counter picking/play as well as toxicity)_, and imo shouldn't really be encouraged in a strategy game.
